alert.note: Alert for Custer Co Plains; Hermosa Foot Hills; Northern Meade Co Plains; Pennington Co Plains; Rapid City; Southern Meade Co Plains; Sturgis, Piedmont Foot Hills (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Dense Fog Advisory issued January 03 at 6:15AM MST until January 03 at 11:00AM MST by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...DENSE FOG ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM MST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Areas of visibility one quarter mile or less at times in dense fog. * WHERE...Portions of northwestern and southwestern South Dakota. * WHEN...Until 11 AM MST this morning. * IMPACTS...Hazardous driving conditions due to low visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The fog may deposit a thin layer of ice on roads, making them slippery.
info.instruction: If driving, slow down, use your headlights, and leave plenty of distance ahead of you.

area.areaDesc: Custer Co Plains; Hermosa Foot Hills; Northern Meade Co Plains; Pennington Co Plains; Rapid City; Southern Meade Co Plains; Sturgis, Piedmont Foot Hills
